snippet.title: Dice Gambit Trailer
snippet.description:
Dice Gambit is an upcoming turn based tactics game with a dice twist.

Take control over your own noble family and rise to power in the city of Neo-Talis, while keeping the threat of the Chromatic monsters under control!

Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812860/Dice_Gambit/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dice_gambit
Join our Discord: discord.gg/8hRzHxpsZ5
